item.description:
Hi All,

The poll is finished and the chosen book is A Long Way Gone: Memoirs of a Boy Soldier (Ishmael Beah). The meetup will likely be at Panera but I will decide for sure later. The next closest book, The Time Traveler's Wife, also had several votes so I will also post the May meetup in a few minutes.

Happy reading,
Cheryl
item.how_to_find_us: I will have my copy of the book on the table.

group.name: The Brookline Book Club Meetup Group

item.name: April Meetup - A Long Way Gone: Memoirs of a Boy Soldier (Ishmael Beah)
